actions.name: Truant
actions.description: Effect: All of the user's attacks have the [Exhaust] trait if they do not have the trait already. All of the user's attacks that are Simple Actions are Complex Actions instead. The user cannot use [Set-Up] attacks. The user's [Exhaust] attacks have +30% Power.
